Initializer# init(id:prefersPromotionalIcon:icon:)

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
nonisolated
init(
    id subscriptionID: Product.ID,
    prefersPromotionalIcon: Bool = false,
    @ViewBuilder icon: () -> Icon
) where PlaceholderIcon == AutomaticProductPlaceholderIcon
```
